script.name: !fight.torus.turret
script.sourceplaintext:
$x = $pos[0] $y = $pos[1] $z = $pos[2] $rot.a = $rot[0] $rot.b = $rot[1] $rot.g = $rot[2]
$guns = [THIS] -> get max. number of lasers in turret 1 while $guns dec $guns = $laser = [THIS] -> get laser type in turret 1 at slot 0 do if $laser break end skip if $laser $laser = SPARE LASER 1
[THIS] ->connect ship command/signal COMMAND_DEFEND_STATION to script !fight.torus.turret with prio 99 [THIS] ->set command: COMMAND_DEFEND_STATION target=[HOMEBASE] target2=$pos par1=$rot par2=null [THIS] ->force position: x=$x y=$y z=$z [THIS] ->set rotation: alpha=$rot.a beta=$rot.b gamma=$rot.g $shield = [THIS] -> get max. shield type that can be installed $shield.num = [THIS] -> get number of shield bays = [THIS] -> install $shield.num units of $shield if [THIS] -> fits laser SPARE LASER 1 into turret 0 $gun.num = [THIS] -> get max. number of lasers in turret 1 = [THIS] -> add $gun.num units of SPARE LASER 1 while $gun.num dec $gun.num = [THIS] ->switch laser in turret 1 gun $gun.num to SPARE LASER 1 end end
$torus = find station: sector=[SECTOR] class or type=Earth Torus race=Terran flags=null refobj=null maxdist=null maxnum=null refpos=null
while [TRUE] if not $torus -> exists [THIS] ->destruct: show no explosion=[TRUE] break end
$max.shield = [THIS] -> get maximum shield strength $max.hull = [THIS] -> get max hull $max.laser = [THIS] -> get maximum laser strength
[THIS] ->set hull to $max.hull [THIS] ->set current shield strength to $max.shield
if [THIS] -> is in active sector @ = wait randomly from 500 to 800 ms if not $doneActive [THIS] ->ignore collisions: [TRUE] [THIS] ->force position: x=$x y=$y z=$z [THIS] ->set rotation: alpha=$rot.a beta=$rot.b gamma=$rot.g [THIS] ->interrupt task 1 with script !turret.attacktarget.adv and prio 99: arg1=1 arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null $doneActive = [TRUE] end else @ = wait randomly from 1500 to 2000 ms $doneActive = [FALSE] end
$trys = random value from 10 to 20 - 1 $target = [THIS] -> get attack target $range = get range of laser SPARE LASER 1 while $target -> exists if not $target -> has same environment as [THIS] [THIS] ->set attack target to null break end [THIS] ->set relations from notoriety: include player as target and race > teladi as owner=[FALSE] [THIS] ->set relation against $target to Foe $dist = get distance between [THIS] and $target *if $dist > $range *= wait 500 ms *else *$ret = [THIS] -> turn turret 1 to target $target : timeout=3000 ms *if $ret == FLRET_FIREFREE skip if $target -> exists break skip if $target -> has same environment as [THIS] break
[THIS] ->set laser energy to $max.laser *= [THIS] -> fire lasers on target $target using turret 1 dec $trys = if $trys < 0 $trys = random value from 10 to 16 - 1 $hull.damage = 0 if $target -> get current shield strength $damage = get shield damage of laser $laser $target.shield = $target -> get current shield strength $target.shield = $target.shield - $damage if $target.shield < 0 $damage = ( ( - $target.shield ) * 100 ) / $damage $hull.damage = get hull damage of laser $laser $hull.damage = ( $damage * $hull.damage ) / 100 $target.shield = 0 end $target ->set current shield strength to $target.shield else $hull.damage = get hull damage of laser $laser end if $hull.damage $target.hull = $target -> get hull $target.hull = $target.hull - $hull.damage if $target.hull <= 0 $target ->destroy object: killer=[THIS], show no explosion=[FALSE] break else $target ->set hull to $target.hull end end end @ = wait 200 ms *else *break *end *end $chk.target = [THIS] -> get attack target skip if $chk.target == $target $trys = random value from 10 to 25 - 1 $target = $chk.target end skip if $target -> exists [THIS] ->set relations from notoriety: include player as target and race > teladi as owner=[FALSE] end return null * v4: rotation added (SymTec) * v5: real shooting and fake shooting separated (SymTec)

line.text: get max. number of lasers in turret
get max. shield type that can be installed
get max. number of lasers in turret
set relations from notoriety: include player as target and race > teladi as owner=

line.comment: *$ret = [THIS] -> turn turret 1 to target $target : timeout=3000 ms
*= [THIS] -> fire lasers on target $target using turret 1

line.text: set relations from notoriety: include player as target and race > teladi as owner=

comment.var: v5: real shooting and fake shooting separated (SymTec)

sval.val: v5: real shooting and fake shooting separated (SymTec)
